constituent: lowly, Wayne Slob, drop, rice field, brains, cornucopia, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: Lowly people only have a drop of brains and use nothing but 4-letter words.
koohiiStory2: A LOWLY single rice grain, DROPPED in an empty FIELD, can produce a CORNUCOPIA of food.
kunYomi: いや.しい、いや.しむ、いや.しめる
readingExamples: 卑しい (いや.しい), 卑しむ (いや.しむ), 卑しめる (いや.しめる)
words: greedy, vulgar, shabby, humble, base, mean, vile
